definition: to dismiss military hierarchy using wine cups/cf Song founding Emperor Song Taizu 宋太祖 holds a banquet in 961 and persuades his senior army commanders to go home to their provinces

sentences.english: The General had promised to cede power by January.
sentences.chinese: 將軍允諾於一月份之前交出兵權。

sentences.english: She had both military and imperial powers.
sentences.chinese: 她集兵權和王權於一身。

sentences.english: Once the military authority has been granted, it should not easily transfered.
sentences.chinese: 兵權一經授予，就不能馬上收回。

definition: to be in overall charge/to oversee
to die or be martyred for a noble cause/to be faithful unto death
to evaluate the merit of sth
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
funds and provisions for the troops/(soldier's) pay
security measures (esp. border security)/official seal (esp. military seal during Qing and Ming times)
to go on a punitive expedition
